Package soot.toolkits.scalar

Class LocalDefsFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.toolkits.scalar.LocalDefsFactory
  • public class LocalDefsFactory
extends Object
    The default implementation of local defs.

      • newLocalDefs

        public LocalDefs newLocalDefs​(Body body,
                              boolean expectUndefined)
        Creates a new LocalDefs analysis based on a ExceptionalUnitGraph If you don't trust the input you should set expectUndefined to true.
        Parameters:
        body -
        expectUndefined - if you expect uses of locals that are undefined
        Returns:
        a new LocalDefs instance
        See Also:
        ExceptionalUnitGraphFactory.createExceptionalUnitGraph(Body)

      • newLocalDefs

        public LocalDefs newLocalDefs​(UnitGraph graph)
        Creates a new LocalDefs analysis based on a given UnitGraph
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a new LocalDefs instance
        See Also:
        UnitGraph(Body)

      • newLocalDefs

        public LocalDefs newLocalDefs​(UnitGraph graph,
                              boolean expectUndefined)
        Creates a new LocalDefs analysis based on a given UnitGraph. If you don't trust the input you should set expectUndefined to true.
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph to work with
        expectUndefined - if you expect uses of locals that are undefined
        Returns:
        a new LocalDefs instance
        See Also:
        UnitGraph(Body), UsesValidator

      • newLocalDefsFlowInsensitive

        public LocalDefs newLocalDefsFlowInsensitive​(UnitGraph graph)
        Creates a new LocalDefs analysis based on a given UnitGraph. This analysis will be flow-insensitive, i.e., for a given local, it will always give all statements that ever write to that local regardless of potential redefinitions in between.
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph to work with
        Returns:
        a new LocalDefs instance
        See Also:
        UnitGraph(Body), UsesValidator
